ygData.subject: RE: warhammer of divine grace
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, I hate 2H blunt as well.  However, I need to get it up there if I want to use the good stuff... I recently bought a Bloodforge hammer, and I only have
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, I hate 2H blunt as well. However, I need to get it up there if I
want to use the good stuff... I recently bought a Bloodforge hammer, and I
only have 80 str. Though I have raised my skill, I still find that I am not
as good with the thing as I want to be. Plus, its funny to see my whole
body shift as I swing the thing. Good thing it does 25 dmg consistently, or
it really wouldn't be worth it. I can't wait to get some strength enhancing
stuff.

-----Original Message-----
From: I. G [mailto:shadowtg1@...]
Sent: 1999/09/20 9:23 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] warhammer of divine grace


From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>

Yea I guess that is good.... but man I hate 2h blunt... Just does not go
with elves. Or halflings I think... they are too small to wield such
weapons. Dwarves on the other hand.... well there ya have it, my PoV even
if ya didnt want it =p

Jaxim

Now mind you I am happy to see that there is a cleric only weapon.


>From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] warhammer of divine grace
>Date: Fri, 17 Sep 1999 22:16:34 GMT
>
>From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
>Looks like we got ourselves a Cleric only weapon (either it is new or
>just previously undiscovered). Unfortunately, either the toughest or
>nearly the toughest creature in the game (aside from POF, perhaps)
>drops it - Lady Vox, in Permafrost.
>
>Warhammer of Divine Grace
>2 hand blunt
>dmg: 18
>delay : 39
>Effect : Yaulp III
>Class : CLR
>Race : All
>
>Can you say "sweet"?
>
>
>Ergo 15th level High Elf Cleric - Test Server
>Hey, I can dream, can't I??!
>
>
